inbodydescription.para: TESTPOINT: thread-isr-thread data passing via fifo

briefdescription.para: Verify zephyr fifo continuous read write in loop.

listitem.para:
Test Steps
fifo put from main thread
fifo read from isr
fifo put from isr
fifo get from spawn thread
loop above steps for LOOPs times

Expected Results
fifo data pass correctly and stably across contexts
